The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 本課程是針對自然界因地質作用所引發的地質災害進行研究，尤其著重於各種地質災害的調查與分析。根據衛星影像與航照判釋、現場地質勘查與分析以及各種潛在危險災害發生率與影響性評估方法，對各種地質災害類型依發生頻率及潛在危險性，討論在區域開發上之限制與事前的整治防範。同時也分析各個地質災害案例，了解人與自然環境的互動關係。
description.en: In the past ten years, There have always been natural earth processes that are hazardous to people of Taiwan. Natural disasters such as typhoon, earthquakes, river flooding hazards, landslides, debris flow hazards and subsidences caused loss of life or property damage. These disasters made people realize that the natural processes that produce natural disasters must be recognized. They must be avoided where possible, and their threat to human life and property must be minimized.In fact, natural hazards are nothing more than natural processes. They become hazards only when people live or work in areas where these processes occur naturally. The purpose of this course is hoped to serve some methods to identify and analysis potentially hazardous processes. It is also provided some concepts and training to formulate various alternatives to avoid or minimize the threat to human life or property.

description.zh: 企業研究方法提供企業解決問題和達成有效決策時所需知知識及技巧，其內容包括1. 了解企業研究特性並以科學思考的角度提出管理問題，2. 了解研究設計策略及其優缺點，3. 了解常用的調查方法及資料收集程序，4. 了解資料分析方法及成果的報告與表達。
description.en: The study of research methods provides student with the knowledge and skills that need to solve the problems and meet the challenges of a fast-paced decision making environment, which include1.	to understand the characters of business research method and propose the management problem or dilemma in scientific viewpoint,2.	to understand the strategies of business research and their evaluation,3.	to understand the research methods and data collection procedures,4.	to understand the data analysis methods/tools and report the final result.

description.zh: 當企業實施全球運籌經營模式;其市場行銷點、產品設計部門、製造工廠、配銷中心與維修服務中心時常散佈於全球不同地點，且各項文件資料或圖檔仍需在全球各點間依權限設定供企業內部與供應鏈成員瀏覽使用，以提昇產品價值與品質、快速回應客戶需求、降低產品設計與製造成本和企業獲利保證。故透過功能超強的網際網路基礎與企業電子化架構之經營環境為全球運籌之必備利器，亦即為虛擬企業之碁石。除此之外，企業亦可經由網際網路與電子化架構和供應商及客戶進行協同商務,可以確保供應鏈內的所有成員都能夠輕易的存取到最即時且正確的產品資訊，故可縮短協同行銷設計、協同產品設計、協同製程設計和協同配銷之週期時間，並提升產品開發團隊的互助合作。藉由設計知識的擷取與重複使用、溝通效率的提高、以及將客戶和供應商緊密的整合在一起，進而更快速的設計出更好的產品，也把重要的創新和寶貴知識傳遞給更多的合作伙伴和供應商，此即為虛擬價值鏈。企業電子化管理課程將介紹企業資源規劃(ERP)、供應鏈管理(SCM)、RFID 之應用, 產品資料管理(PDM)、虛擬製程設計, 製造執行系統(MES)與生產現場資訊整合系統 (SFIS)、知識管理(KM)等電子化模組以及它們如何串連以營運虛擬企業，另外
description.en: At present stage, globalization and multiple-sites running are evitable for enterprise to save cost and accomplish the aim of more profit. Therefore, E-business running is necessary to reach quicker response and share the updating information and documentation among multiple-sites and its supply chain. These information and documentation are accessed globally between marketing department, R&D department, production shop floor, financial department, service center, and retailers. To keep correct information and connection, enterprises have to acknowledge the flow process of each E-modules. More often, enterprises have to monitor each E-modules to guarantee the employee do their jobs based on correct and update information. In addition, the global competition became more intensive between supply chains. That is, a supply chain competes with another supply chain. Therefore, the collaborative capabilities for the members within a supply chain became more crucial. The collaborative commerce

description.zh: 本課程係針對企業高階管理碩士探討與企業財務與資本市場相關之財務管理決策問題。探討主題包括財務報表分析、企業資產評價、資本預算、財務風險與報酬、企業融資與股息政策。本課程並著重案例研討以驗證財務管理決策。
description.en: This course studies the financial aspects of managerial decisions especially on corporate finance and capital markets. The topics of this course includes financial statement analysis, valuation of real and financial assets, capital budgeting, risk and expected return, corporate financing and dividend policy. The course draws heavily on empirical research to help guide financial management decisions.

description.zh: 本課程針對與精實企業體相關的重要議題，包括規劃，發展與實行。從人員，技術，流程與資訊面，對一家實際施行精實生產公司做全體性的架構考量。特別強調產品研發，生產以及延伸出的供應鍊，這些橫跨精實企業體中的不同面向的整合。資訊需求、科技與流程這些使企業完成整合的要素將被闡述。分析與實行工具的未來趨勢與使用方法也是探討的重點。本課程重點為價值溪流(value stream)--從概念發展直到產品交付，以及後勤支援--的企業層級評估的分組專題研究。學期專題包含評估現在公司的製程/資訊流，資源需求，技術利用及週期時間。專題最後必須提出書面專題報告，以及提出企業轉化為「精實」企業體，必須採取的建議行動的簡報。
description.en: This course addresses some of the important issues involved with the planning, development and implementation of Lean Enterprises. People, technology, process and information dimensions of an effective lean company will be addressed in a unified framework. Particular emphasis will be placed on the integration of these dimensions across the entire enterprise, including product development, production, and the extended supply chain. Information requirements and technology and process enablers for achieving enterprise integration will be addressed. Analysis and implementation tools as well as future trends and directions will be explored.A key component of this class will be team projects involving Enterprise-level evaluation of value streams from concept development through product delivery and support. description.zh: 企業智慧也可以稱為商業智慧(Business Intelligence, BI)，是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。本課程將由基本資訊收集技術開始介紹（包括RFID），也將包括資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後將重點放在BI與企業資源規劃、BI與電子商務、BI與顧客關係管理等議題上。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用BI套裝軟體，EMBA班學生可以討論其熟悉產業之KPI，並將其專業上相關資訊在此系統上實際應用，體驗BI對企業之重要性。
description.en: Introduction:Business intelligence (BI) is a business management term which refers to applications and technologies which are used to gather, provide access to, and analyze data and information about their company operations. Business intelligence systems can help companies have a more comprehensive knowledge of the factors affecting their business, such as metrics on sales, production, internal operations, and they can help companies to make better business decisions. In this course, data collection techniques, such as RFID, will be introduced firstly. Database and data warehouse concepts will also be mentioned. Applications of BI in ERP, EC and CRM will be the important focus of this course. Students will have a chance to implement BI based on his business-related data in this course.Outline of this course: 	●Introduction to business intelligence 	●RFID and its application 	●Database and data warehouse 	●BI and ERP 	●BI and EC 	●BI and CRM 	●Case study

description.en: The purpose of this course is to integrate the most resent thinking about organization design with classic and traditional ideas and theories. This course covers the following three major parts: Part 1: organization and organization theories Part 2: organization structure and design Part 3: new thinking of organization design in the Internet era, Part IV case study.

description.zh: 探討企業如何蒐集、提供資訊，以有效強化策略管理，主題包括：1. 從價值鏈分析，掌握策略面的成本管理。2. 從資訊系統的策略性使用，引領企業創新。3. 以資訊科技再造組織，作為策略性目標的啟動機制。

Strategic use of information systems for business innovation3. Using information technology as a re-engineering tool for achieving strategic initiatives

description.zh: 本課程可使學生瞭解：貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項‧

description.zh: 企業研究的本質、科學方法、研究之概念基礎、理論與研究、研究之概念基、礎、研究問題與假設、文獻參考與研究變數、操作性定義之建立、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、研究草案、調查研究法、問卷法、訪問研究法、歷史文憲法與觀察法、個案研究法、量表法、實驗法、資料之分析法、單變量分析與一般統計分析、多變量分系、資料的解釋、研究報告、企業研究與決策之應用。

description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）services cape, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）customer value management,（10）service pricing.

description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metallic, ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materials for dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 本課程主要是講述由粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結電接點材料、燒結機械另件燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過粉末冶金課程的學生，能進一步對粉末冶金技術之應用有更多的了解。

description.zh: 表面處理是各種製造工業不可或缺的過程，不論是傳統的工業或現代的高科技產業，表面處理都一直扮演著極重要的角色。本課程主 要是對表面處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括表面處理技術的基本 理論，前處理技術，各種表面處理的方法與相關知識，表面處理的 工業安全與衛生以及各種表面處理技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Surface treatment is an essential process at all kinds of manufacturing process, eitherin traditonal industry or in modern high-tech industry, surface treatment is alwaysplaying an very important role. The course mainly discusses the theory basis, methodand application of surface treatment technique, in order to cultivate interest andprofessional knowledge for students. The course contents include the fundamentaltheory of surface treatment, pre-treatment technique, all kinds of surface treatmentmethods and their related knowledge, the industrial safety and sanitation of surfacetreatment, and the application of surface treatment techniques.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Management of High Rise Buildings

Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 本課程係提供防火工程有關基礎概論、設計工學手法及實務技術等理論與應用兼重的課程，以促進學生自立研討學習能力，提高教學良性互動關係，可供職場工程實務相關防火工程之重要技能與知識。內容包括：一、現行防火安全法規與性能式防火法規二、性能式防火設計基礎概論三、防止起火及火災成長有關技術四、火災探測與滅火有關技術五、控制室內外延燒擴大有關技術六、避難疏散與逃生有關技術七、煙氣控制有關技術八、構造耐火設計有關技術
description.en: The purpose of course is to provide the fundamental theory and practical technique about the fire protection engineering, encourage the establishment of self-learning ability of students and facilitate their skill and knowledge about fire protection engineering in construction job. The course covers the following subjects:1.fire safety related regulation and performance-based code in force2.fundamental theory for performance-based design3.prevention techniques about fire initiation and growth4.techniques of fire detection and extinguishment5.control techniques about interior and exterior flame-spread6.means of evacuation and escape7.techniques of smoke control8.techniques about fire resistance design of structure

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 本課程將教授基本的統計工具以使學生能成為稱職的工程師。因此本課程將包含基本的統計課程，也會應用大量的實例說明統計的原理、方法及如何加以用於問題之分析，在課程中學生也將設計、實作及分析所提出之實驗設計。
description.en: This course will provide basic statistical tools to let students become successful engineers in industry.  We will cover the topics usually covered in a beginning statistics course, but also will include an introduction to factorial experiment in an effective way to investigate the potential effects of multiple suspected influences on a response.  The students will design, perform, and analyze a factorial experiment during this class.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹應用於工業或製程上之冷凍系統的原理設計與應用。主要內容包含: 製冰、溜冰場、食品製程、水壩建造與相關土木應用、化學工業製程、以及相關冷凍節能技術。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to introduce the principles of the refrigeration systems used in industrial applications. The topics of this course include the following: 1). Ice manufacture. 2) Ice rinks. 3) Food processing. 4) Concrete dams and subsurface soils. 5) Refrigeration in the chemical industry. 6) Energy saving technology.

description.zh: 污染源分析，室內空氣品質標準，濃度平衡之計算法，空氣之過濾原理與設計，建築通風法規，生物潔淨室標準，化學過濾應用，ASHRAE 62標準之探討
description.en: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維與管理知能，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域創新管理相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計創新管理相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, communication, leadership, strategy, globalization, and interdisciplinary collaboration.

name.en: Study of Design Thoughts and Movements

description.zh: 本課程的目的是協助研究生準備進行有關設計史、設計理論與設計評論等主題之碩士論文研究，與實務專題設計之創作理念與風格的理論探討，提供總體觀照設計思潮所需之理論縱深與歷史距離。課程內容以多元辨證方式，針對(1)各種設計思想與運動：現代主義與後現代主義、結構主義與後結構主義、資本主義與社會主義等，以及(2)各派設計論述：行為派、系統派、認知派、語言派、歷史派、社會派等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help graduate students to prepare their master's theses that are related to design history, theories and criticism, or to review related design concepts and styles for their graduate projects. This course provides the necessary theoretical perspectives and historical distances and its contents contain pluralism-oriented reflections of (1) design thoughts and movements: modernism and post-modernism, structuralism and post-structuralism, capitalism and socialism, and (2) design discourses: behavioral research, systematic science, cognitive science, linguistics, history, sociology, and alternative design).

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究

With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.

description.zh: 本課程主要以土地資源之「自然」、「經濟」為綜合體探討，研究其類型特徵、數量價值、調查評價、開發利用、經營管理、保護與等問題的綜合知識，尤著重都市土地問題探討。在課程內容上，根據學科發展現狀，明確和規範土地資源方面一些基本概念，如土地、土地資源、土地資源類型及土地資源的各個組成要素等，並加強了土地資源管理開發領域的一些研究內容和方法的介紹，如土地利用、土地生態設計、土地整理、土地開發、土地利用監測等內容之概論。
description.en: The course mainly focuses the comprehensive dimensions on the "Nature" and "Economics" of land resources. The type characteristics, amount and value, survey and evaluation, development and use, management, and preservation of land resources, especially problems of urban land, would be discussed.  According to the state-of-the-art trends of this discipline, the course covers some basic concepts of land resources that should be clarified and specified, including land, land resources, the types and components of land resources, and many among others. Also, the knowledge and methodologies concerning land resource development and management, such as land use, land ecological design, land reclamation, land development, and land-use monitoring, will be introduced.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。

description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Optimal Control 的理論基礎與其應用﹐範圍從古典的早期發展到最新的進展都包括在內，其目的在使同學能具有最佳控制器設計能力。 內容包括: 最佳化問題求解、線性二次調整器設計、線性二次高斯觀測器設計。此外，現代控制中常用的loop shaping及loop transfer recovery技術亦將在課程中介紹。預修課程 ： 線性控制系統(可同時修)、工程數學
description.en: 1.	Introduction.2.	Mathematical preliminaries for optimal control.3.	Classical linear quadratic optimal control, including regulation & tracking control.4.	Observer based optimal control (LQG control). 5.	Loop shaping and LTR control.  This is a course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to design an optimal controller for linear systems with a specific performance index. Concepts such as optimality condition, linear quadratic regulation (LQR), and linear quadratic gaussian (LQG) problem are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also includes the loop shaping concept and the loop transfer recovery (LTR) technique which are frequently used in the modern control.

description.zh: 本科目介紹各種軟體系統之設計及實作觀念。主要之課程包括有：1.系統軟體概念與電腦結構2.組譯器基本概念3.組譯器之設計與實作4.載入器與連結器之基本概念5.載入器與連結器之設計與實作6.巨集處理器之基本概念7.巨集處理器之設計與實作8.編譯器之基本功能9.編譯器之設計理與實作10.其他系統軟體之介紹。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of system software.The major topics covered in this course are :1.System software and Machine structure2.The concept of Assemblers3.The implementation of Two-pass Assembler4.The concept of Loaders and Linkers   5.The implementation of Loaders and Linkers 6.The concept of Macro Processor7.The implementation of Macro Processor8.The concept of compiler9.The concept of Operating System10.Other System Software

description.zh: 1.電路元件2.電路特性3.網路方程式4.穩態分析及頻率響應5.網路函數：極點及零點6.雙埠網路分析7.傅利葉及拉普拉斯轉換
description.en: 1.Circuit components2.Circuit characteristics3.Network equations4.Steady state analysis and frequency response5.Network Functions: poles and zeros6.Two-port network analysis7.Fourier and laplace transform

description.zh: 本課程可視為電磁學之延續，介紹電磁波在各種媒質及結構中的傳播特性，以及這些現象在通訊科技之應用，討論主題如下：1.馬克斯威爾方程式之複習，2.電磁場與材料之互作用，3.電磁波於線性／非線性、全向性／異向性與均勻／不均勻材料中之傳播，4.導波管與共振腔，5.微波電路。
description.en: 1.Maxwell equations2.Magnetic fields and materials3.EM wave propagation in linear/nonlinear materials4.EM wave propagation in homogeneous/hetrogeneous materials5.Em wave propagation in isotropic/anisotropic materials6.Waveguides and resonators7.Microwave circuits

description.zh: 1.發展歷史與演進2.程序觀念3.非同步平行程序4.死結及無限等待5.主記憶體管理6.虛擬記憶體結構與管理7.處理器排程8.磁碟管理9.網路及系統安全
description.en: 1.History and evolution 2.Process concepts3.ASynchronous concurrent processes4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt5.Real storage management6.Virtual storage organization and management 7.Processor scheduling 8.Disk mansgement9.Network and security

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１.抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２.靜態結構及其儲存法，３.遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４.佇列，５.串列、鏈結串列，６.樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７.圖形，８.排序，９.搜尋、雜湊。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and computational complexity, (2) static structures and their storage representations , (3) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and posfix expressions, (4) queues, (5) lists and linked lists, (6) trees, binary trees, height balanced trees, and heaps,  (7) graphs, (8) soring, and (9) searching and hashing.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程探討聚合反應及應用反應機構，合成方式包含逐步聚合反應、鏈鎖聚合反應，共聚合反應並研討高分子的化學反應，及其他高分子有關技術。
description.en: The major topics include step reaction polymers, chain reaction polymers, copolymerization, reactions of polymers and polymer technology

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程介紹近代電化學的分析方法。 介紹內容包含電位法、循環伏安法、安培法、光譜電化學法、旋轉環碟電極法、及其他近代電化學的分析方法。
description.en: Introduction the principles and applications of modern electroanalytical methods. Introduction the theory and application of polarography, potentiometry, cyclic voltammetry, Amperometry, spectroelectrochemistry, RRDE, and other modern electroanalytical techniques.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹window 作業系統之基本操作技巧，word 文書處理軟體、Excel計算表軟體及Power Point 簡報軟體製作之 基本應用。
description.en: The course introduces the basic operating skills of the window system and the application software such as word processors (MS WORD) spreadsheet calculators (Excel) and the prestation media (Power Point ).

description.zh: 本課程在闡述化學工業中以環保出發的催化劑之原理與應用。內容包括催化劑之化學結構、反應性、製備、物性鑑定、反應動力學分析。由催化循環、反應機制、催化劑結構、動力學來說明催化反應之原理。除此，並著重於介紹各催化反應應用類型：催化反應在溶液中、酵素、沸石孔洞及重要之工業固相觸媒。
description.en: This course explores the principles and applications of catalysts for the environmentally benign chemical processes. Topics include the concepts in chemical structure and reactivity of catalyst, catalyst preparation, catalyst characterization, and micro kinetic analysis of catalytic processes. The principles are illustrated with catalytic cycles, reaction mechanisms, catalyst structures, and kinetics. Additionally, we emphasis on applications of catalysis in solution, enzymes, solid and surfaces, within the molecular-scale cages of zeolites and sieves, the most important industrial catalysts.

description.zh: 介紹防止環境污染相關之防止技術。依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同污染源，分別探討解決空氣、水質、土壤、噪音以及熱污染之防治方法。
description.en: This course introduces the technology of environmental pollution prevention. It investigates the way to control air, water, soil, noise and thermal pollutions according to various gas, liquid, solid, noise and radioactive pollution sources.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.en: History of Gear Development, Definition, Classify, and Special Gear Profile, Principle of Gear Action, Gear Manufacture, Failure Type, Load Capacity Estimation, Gear Lubrication.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control,  Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 1. 統計緒論；2. 數據的性質與蒐集；3. 隨機變數與機率分配；4. 假設檢定與變異數分析；5. 兩母體的統計分析；6. 迴歸分析；7. 實驗設計
description.en: 1. Introduction to statistics；2. Data Summary and Presentation；3. Random Variables and Probability Distributions；4 Decision Making for a Single Sample；5. Decision Making for two Samples；6. Building Empirical Models；7. Design of Engineering Experiments

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     視覺檢測系統之硬體與原理，數位影像處理，特徵萃取及模式辨識，應用及案例研討，論文討論，專題研究。
description.en: Hardware and Principle of Vision Inspection Systems, Digital Image Processing, Feature Extraction and Pattern Recognition, Application and Cases Study, Special     Topics.

description.zh: 使用者、設計品、使用情境及設計者間之記號模式、記號架構、記號表達及記號溝通、記號認知及記號操作之理論。
description.en: This course provides theory of interaction design related topics on cognitive Semiotics between user, object and designer. This is where the viewpoint of sign model and sign operation

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 開課：機電、製科所合開（上學期）(含一般生、在職生)本課程說明RFID系統架構，技術、編碼、和應用標準，資訊系統，效益評估，隱私權問題，及各領域或產業的創新應用和案例。
description.en: This course is to explain the RFID system structure, the standard of technology, object coding and applications, IT solution systems, ROI considerations, privacy issues, and then the innovative applications in different field or industry.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹奈米結構材料之合成及其製程技術。內容大綱包括三部分：第一、奈米材料基本物理與化學特性，第二、奈米粉末和薄膜結構材料之化學合成，物理合成製程原理與特性，奈米塊體材料的性能與製備，第三、奈米結構材料應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first four chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of nanostructured Material. The next two chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the synthesis, processing and fabrication of nanostructured materials. The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 1. 電力與能源2.節能與儲能 3.能源應用與環境4.能源監控技術5.能源管制技術 6.能源管理
description.en: 1. Power and Energy 2.Energy Control and Storage3.Energy Application and Environment4.Energy Monitoring Technology 5.Energy Control Technology 6.Energy Managements.

name.zh: 建築生命周期管理特論

description.zh: 本課程主要探討整體建築生命周期(從企劃、設計、施工、使用維護、改建、解體再利用等)之管理科學的理論以及實際管理的操作手法。授課內容如下面內容所示:專題討論內容     ■ 專案管理的基本概念與思想、建築專案的諸管理活動■ 建築物的生命週期管理(LCM)與經濟性■ 建築專案環境計畫的理論與實績(EMS)■ 建築專案之營運與設施管理計畫(FM)■ 建築專案的renovation管理手法 (RM)■ 建築部品及組件的物流與供應鏈管理(SCM)■ 建築相關知科技整合(Technology fusion)與技術管理科學(MOT)■ 建築專案管理的整合與課題
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the complete theories of the management of building projects, regarding whole achitectural lifecycle(from planning, design, construction, maintenance, re-construction, to dismantling and material reusage), and its actual implementation methods. Its contents include fundamental concepts and ideas in Project Management, the rating modes and case studies of LifeCycle Management, and introduction to the Management of Technology & Technology Fusion concept that has become widely popular among foreign academics. The scoring for this curriculum will be based upon either two hand-in reports or open-book exams.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討基本室內環境品質與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1.以各種類型的建築室內環境為主題；2.探討人為環境與人體健康之關係；3.探討建築材料、構造與設備對室內環境各項因子之影響；4.學習室內環境品質量測儀器之操作與判讀能力；5.具備診斷與改善一般室內環境議題之相關專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss the relationship between Indoor Environment Quality and human healthy, and make sure our students can realize the knowledge of healthy environment and manage it.Contents：1. The indoor environment of different types of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Discuss the influence of the building material, construction and equipment on indoor environment.4. Learn to use the instrument to measure indoor environment quality.5. Learn to diagnose and improve indoor environment quality.

description.zh: 以纖維材料與複合材料的知識為基礎，實際應用於纖維系複合材料實習；並利用各種現有之機械與電氣性質檢測儀器，對其性能加以評估。其實習內容包括熱可塑與熱固性樹脂之製備；單軸向、雙軸向與三軸向複合材料之加工等之實習;及複合材料機械與電氣性質等之實習。
description.en: On the basis of knowledge from the fiber and composites, various experiments are carried out.  Different measuring instruments are also used to measure and evaluate their mechanical and electrical properties.  The practice includes thermoplastic and thermosetting resin preparation, fiber prepreg preparation, 1-D, 2-D, and 3-D composites processing methods are included. Such as filament winding, hand lay-up, molding compounds, autoclave and vacuum bag method, injection molding, compression molding, SMC, and BMC, pultrusion etc. Otherwise, the mechanical and electrical properties of the composites are also studied.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為電子構裝高分子、電路成像高分子、光電子成像材料、最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電性及有機電晶體材料。
description.en: This is a special course on the topics of optoelectronic polymer materials. It includes polymers for electron package, photoresist, and photoimaging. Also, the advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode, conducting polymer and organic transistor.

name.zh: 多媒體於機械工程之應用
name.en: Multi-medium techniques and their applications on         Me

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹各式多媒體軟體應用，以Flash動畫軟體為主，輔以不同軟體於機械工程上如︰實習、實驗及機構等之應用實例；使機械系的學生了解多媒體製作，進而發揮其創意及設計能力，將實務及構想以動畫之方式展現。
description.en: Introduce various multimedia application program, Use FLASH software, associated with related animation software, to behave Mechanical Engineering significance, such as courses of experiment practice and mechanism etc, This course will let student understand how the Multimedia be produced, develop their design capability as well as invention, and perform the practice and configuration by animation.

description.zh: 先修課程：半導體元件物理﹙4005032﹚。本課程著重於IC製程技術之學習。課程內容包括：IC絕緣技術、模組製程技術、導線技術、整合工程技術、SOC技術及半導體奈米元件技術等。
description.en: A study on advanced IC process. The contents cover IC isolation technology, module process, interconnection line process, process integration, SOC applications and CMOS nano device engineering etc.

description.zh: 許多的物理系統，從生物系統(人體模型)、機械結構(機器人)到柔性結構(人造衛星系統)等均可模擬成多體之機械系統。本課程將以Euler-Lagrange methodology and Kane's Equations來建立此機械系統的模型，並探討如何分析及設計其特徵及穩定性。另外，本課程將介紹目前研究多體機械系統中最常用之套裝軟體，並讓學生使用其中一種作專題實例的應用。
description.en: An increasing number of physical systems, ranging from bio-systems (human-body models) to mechanisms (robots) to flexible structures (satellite booms), are being modeled as a multi-body mechanical systems.  This course is trying to use Euler-Lagrange methodology and Kane's Equations to build up these mechanical system models.  And to investigate how to design and analysis the characteristic and stability of them.  Also, the course will introduce the most popular multi-body mechanical systems program packets and the students need to use one of these packages to solve an engineering project.

description.zh: 介紹岩石基本力學特性與概念的力學模型，並透過其在工程應用分析方法與案例之探討，使學習者對於岩石力學在岩體工程的應用，具有一貫性的瞭解與邏輯性的思考。
description.en: This course first introduces the mechanical behaviors and conceptual models of rock masses.  Many applications on rock engineering are then illustrated and discussed.  These aim to train the students to be familiar with relevant theorems and practices of rock engineering.

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解國內車輛產業的背景、現況和當前所面臨的課題，同時介紹車輛產業的分野，包括其架構、職掌、功能 和任務。最後論述未來國內車輛產業的動向和國際分工。
description.en: The aims of the course are to take on comprehension for learners that the background of vehicle industry, current situation developing and the issues we have been faced. Additionally, the demarcation of vehicle industry is introduced, including the structure, responsibility, function and its mission. Finally, the future trend, international uniting cooperation for domestic vehicle industry is discussed.

description.zh: 車輛動力系統介紹，車輛耗能分析，動力系統之能源與動力單元(汽柴油引擎、替代燃料引擎、燃料電池、電力)，動力系統整車匹配。非傳統車輛動力系統：電動車、複合動力車、燃料電池車。
description.en: Introduction of Vehicle Power System, Energy Consumption Analysis, Energy Source and Power Unit (Gasoline and Diesel Engine, Alternative Fuel, Electricity), Vehicle Matching for Power System. Non-traditional Vehicle Power System: Electric Car, Hybrid Electric Vehicle, Fuel Cell Vehicle.

description.zh: 介紹汽機車上各控制系統之硬體及控制策略，包含引擎系統之空燃比、怠速、冷起動、爆震、廢氣，傳動系統之變速、傳動，煞車系統之ABS、TCS、SRS，懸吊系統之半主動及主動式懸吊，智慧型道路系統之頭燈、環境、巡航、跟隨、夜視等控制系統。
description.en: This course introduces hardware and control strategies used in each control systems in a vehicle.  These control systems include engine system (AF ratio, idle speed, cold start, knocking, exhaust), transmission system, brake system (ABS, TCS, SRS), suspension system (semi-active and active), intelligent transportation system (headlight, environment, cruise, following, night vision) etc..

description.zh: 車輛空氣動力學理論基礎，車輛空氣動力學機構，空氣動力學，汽車空氣動力特性，卡車空氣動力特性，汽車空氣動力風阻與特性，汽車行駛安全與舒適，汽車行駛噪音與防治方法，及車輛空氣動力設計要點。
description.en: Introduction of automobile aerodynamics, Some aerodynamics fundamentals of fluids mechanics, Aerodynamic drag of passenger cars, Directional stability, Safety and comfort, Wind noise, Mechanisms of noise generation and transmission, Design features。

description.zh: 汽車之動力性、汽車總論、引擎、底盤、傳動及電系、燃油經濟性、制動性、操縱穩定性、平順性及行駛性。
description.en: Automotive Service and Shop Work, Automobile Engines, Automobile Electrical and Electronic Equipment, Engine Performance and Drive-ability, Automotive Engine Service, Automotive Drive Trains, Automotive Chassis.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

name.en: The Romance of Three Kingdoms and The Chinese Culture

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用。基本上，以眾所熟知的歷史小說《三國演義》為主軸，來探討中國文化的發展過程中，其在歷史上所扮演角色地位。在文化精神上，它結合了儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的智慧結晶，開創了新時代的思維視野，對映著儒家文化的另股反思力量，擴展了豐富的文化精神，具有著人生啟示作用。準此，來充實學生文化素養，課程方面包括《三國演義》的文化心理結構，倫理觀，儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的政治思想，與人物形象之塑造等，藉以幫助學生清晰地認識《三國演義》文化精神在中國文化內涵中之特色。再授課方面，以師生共同討論為主，書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內認識《三國演義》的時代精神，並對日後生活有所助益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the role and significance of the historical fiction The Romance of the Three kingdoms in the development of the Chinese culture.In the spiritual aspect, The Romance of the Three kingdoms demonstrated the intellectual essence of Confucianism, Mohism,Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school of ancient China. It also innovates new visions and new horizons in the traditional Confucian milieu, thus enriching the spirituality of the Chinese culture. The course includes the following topics of The Romance of the Three kingdoms ：the cultural psychological structure, the ethic view, the political views of Confucianism, Mohism, Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school, the characterization, etc. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also expected to submit written reports.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養有效率的工業人才。包括生產、分配、消費財貨與勞務的各部門，無論是新進的員工或最高層的經理，如要請求效率，則定須具備本門知識。本課程分四方面：（一）、人事心理，包括工作分析，人事選用程序及方法，人事測驗原理及應用，工作考核，員工訓練，工作評價；（二）、組織社會心理，包括動機理論與管理，態度與士氣的測量，組織理論與人行為，領導行為，員工參與，意見溝通；（三）、工程心理，包括工作環境與工作效率，機械設備與工作設計，意外防止與工業安全；（四）、消費心理，包括消費行為，廣告宣傳。上課方式包含講授，討論個人習作等。
description.en: This course is designed for cultivating the effective industrial workers. Whoever he is, the person should be full of the knowledge of Industrial Psychology if only he is working and if only he wants to be an effective worker, no matter he is a new person or top management, working in industry or in business, for government or for forivate institute, The focuses of this course will be on (1)personal psychology:including job analysis, personel selection program, the principles and appliance of personnel tests, performance appraisal, personnel training training, job evaluation, (2)social psychology of the organization:including the theory and management of motivation, the measurement of attitude and morale, leadership, employee participation, communication; (3)engineering psychology:including work conditions and industrial effectiveness, machine and job design, accident prevention and insustrial safety; (4)consumer psychology:including consum behavior and advertising. In class, lecture,

description.zh: 諺語是人類生活智慧在文字語言上的極致表現，藉著短短的一句話卻能表達出內涵豐富的意義，西洋諺語中在人際關係上有許多獨特的見解，不但深入且幽默更發人深省的句子；例如：(1)Give and take.  (中譯：施與受；與人交往應有來有往，互相體諒。)  (2)Wake not a sleeping lion. (中譯：勿驚擾睡獅；即勿自找麻煩。)    本課程目標為：(1)從西洋諺語中讓學生瞭解人性的需求以及人際關係的基礎 (2)從含意深刻的西洋諺語中使學生體會正確的人生態度，進而明白建立良好人際關係的技巧 (3)藉西洋諺語之介紹讓學生瞭解諺語之典故、使用法，達到提昇學生英文涵養之目的。    本課程將採取啟發法、小組討論、上台報告等授課方式，藉以增進學生思考及上台說話之能力。
description.en: Proverbs are the wisest words expressed in human life. By means of the short sentence, it has profound meaning. There are many particular views, not only deep but humorous, about human relationships in English proverbs. For examples: (1) Give and take. (2) Wake not a sleeping lion.  Both are short and have metaphor related with human relationships.     The objectives of this course are: (1) Let students understand the human needs and the bases of human relationships through English proverbs. (2) Let students realize the right attitude about the ways one should treats people, and then can establish the better technique for human relationships. (3) By means of using English proverbs to make students understand the proverbs' origin, usages and then to improve students English ability.    This course uses the methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, student presentation, and etc. In these ways we can advance students' ability to do deep thought and improve their speech ability when

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 從日語的50音、日常問候用語及自我介紹等開始學起，循序漸進學會日語會話基本語彙、句型及用法等，課程中介紹日本生活習慣、日本文化與年中行事，並採用CD等視聽輔助教材，進行聽力訓練、會話練習及日本歌謠及演歌教唱等。
description.en: This is a beginner's course for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. The aims of the courses are to increase students' ability to use the Japanese language for academic, business, and social purposes. In addition, students are introduced to relevant aspects of Japan's life and culture and prepared for work in the specific subject fields.

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

name.en: Analysis of the Historic Persons in Modern China

description.zh: 自國父鼓吹革命，以迄民國肇造，多少英雄豪傑活躍於歷史舞台上。對於這些時代人物的臧否、評價，實有進一步認識和了解的必要，以便在閱讀此段歷史之時，能作出正確而客觀的判斷。是以本課程擬就民國時期中，較具有關鍵且影響力較大的人物作一公正持平的介紹。此外，台灣在日據時期，亦有多位民主鬥士，不畏異族的高壓統治，竭盡所能，鼓吹新思想、倡導民主運動，其精神實在可佩，對於這些人物我們不可不知，自然亦在我們所要講授的範圍之內。
description.en: Since the revolution of Dr. Sun Yat-sen, many people have played important roles in Chinese history. They have had much influences in our country. It is essential for our students to have further knowledge about them, especiallt during the period of Japanese occupation in Taiwan. There were many people who didn't yield to Japanese control and promoted the democratic movement in Taiwan. They loved the land and tried their best to advocate new thought.In the course, we'll make detailed and accurate introductions about them. Fair understanding will make the students have objective comments about historic persons and the history of the period.

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意本課程利用要徑法教導學生管理一項專案有關時間及成本的估計，進度表，預算編列等技巧，及其它監督控制一項專案進行之措施。專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。課程內容包含：（1）專案的定義和辨認，（2）專案可行性研究和選擇條件，（3）專案進度表編排，（4）專案之預算與成本控制，（5）限制性資源之編排與調配，（6）專案評核與檢討技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the technique of Critical Path Method (CPM) to manage a project in terms of time / cost estimation, scheduling, budgeting, and other control / monitoring measures on the performance of a project. The role of project manager in an organization will also be discussed. Topics to be covered are: (1) Concept and identification of a project, (2) Project feasibility study and selection criteria, (3) Project scheduling, (4) Budgeting and cost control, (5) Constrained resource scheduling and leveling, and (6) Project evaluation and review technique.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

description.zh: 空調設計基礎、空調冷暖負載計算、空氣線圖應用分析、主要設備規範擬定、空調系統規劃與設備選用分析、風管工程設計、水配管工程設計、設備配置與裝設工程、材料與成本分析、節約省能規劃設計。
description.en: Fundamentals of HVAC system design, cooling/ heating load estimation, analysis of applied psychometrics charts, schematic design of HVAC system, main equipment selection, main equipment specification, air duct & water piping system design, equipments layout & installation, materials & cost analysis. HVAC's energy saving & energy efficient planning.

name.en: Ice Thermal Storage Air Conditioning Technology

description.zh: 本課程內容包含：儲冰空調系統概論、基本系統設計考量、各種儲冰技術比較、冰盤管內融冰式儲冰系統、冰盤管外融冰式儲冰系統、冰球式儲冰系統、製冰滑落式儲冰系統、優態鹽儲冰系統、儲冰空調系統設計步驟、儲冰空調系統之檢測以及實際案例研討。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a practical level of the knowledge of cool thermal storage technology. The course includes the following topics: 1) Introduction, provides basic background on cool storage concepts and terminology. 2) Fundamental design considerations. 3) Comparison of storage technologies. 4) Internal melt ice-on-coil storage systems. 5) External melt ice-on-coil storage systems. 6) Encapsulated ice. 7) Eutectic salt phase-change materials. 8) ice harvesting systems. 9) Design procedure. 10) Performance testing and 11) Case study.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹多媒體設計系統其中包括系統的操作技巧、運動與動畫製作技巧、互動與交談設計、軟體除錯與包裝、多媒體教材製作等相關技術。課程內容主要為：產業結構現況、影像處理、多媒體概論和企畫設計、網路動畫、音效視訊處理和專題製作等。
description.en: This module is concerned with Multimedia Authoring Scripting and the use of Multimedia Development Tools and applying them in cross-platform multimedia production. This course provides the student with a knowledge of the various concepts and techniques used in multimedia systems.

description.zh: 硬體描述語言介紹、FPGA製作、特殊應用積體電路設計、CMOS邏輯電路設計與合成、數位電路時序調整、比較器、取樣保持電路、參考電壓與線性轉導電路、基本信號轉換電路介紹、數位類比轉換電路、類比數位轉換電路、超取樣轉換電路、鎖相迴路設計、雜訊與不良匹配分析等單元。
description.en: Verilog and VHDL, FPGA, ASIC, Combinational logic gates in CMOS, Timing issues in digital circuits, Comparator, Sample and Hold, Voltage reference, Translinear circuit, Data converter fundamentals, Nyquist-rate DAC, Nyquist-rate ADC, Oversampling converters, PLL, Noise and Mismatch.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

name.zh: 環境政策與國際環保事務

description.zh: 環境保護近年來備受全球重視，國際環保公約如保護地球臭氧層的蒙特婁議定書及保護瀕臨絕種野生物種的華盛頓公約，都備有貿易條款，對不遵守規範國家，得施以相關貿易制裁；世界貿易組織（WTO）中設置貿易與環保委員會，以協調貿易與環保間之問題與紛爭。因此本課程之目的在於加強學生對我國環境問題、政策及環保國際公約之深入了解，以作為進一步培養對環境規劃及管理之能力。
description.en: The environmental treaties such as Montreal protocol or Basel Convention require all the parties in the world to take appropriate measures to protect human health and the environment against adverse effects.  Therefore, the purpose of this class is to provide the comprehensive information on those international treaties and the resulting efforts and policies in Taiwan

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹微處理系統的介面設計。其中包括記憶體介面，一般的輸出輸入介面以及CPLD/FPGA介面。由於CPLD與FPGA大量應用在嵌入式系統中，如何利用微處理器的彈性軟體設計，搭配CPLD/FPGA的高速運算能力，將是本課程的重點。
description.en: Interfacing between microprocessor and peripheral will be discussed in this course.  The interfacing technique includes memory interface, general peripheral and CPLD/FPGA devices.  A large number of industrial applications have applied CPLD/FPGA into their design.  This course will also focus on integrating of microcontroller and CPLD/FPGA devices by taking advantages of the flexibility of microcontroller and high speed calculation capability of CPLD/FPGA devices.

description.zh: 介紹工程契約之內容與種類，以及其實際的作業程序及相關的投標規定；此外並說明規範的製定內涵與意義，同時探討其對工程之影響與重要性。
先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

notes: 與機電所合開,自動化所為選修

description.zh: 本課程主要探討物業管理理論以及實際的操作手法。並結合現有的物業管理案例說明其實例運作方式在台灣的課題與機會。
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the propertymanagement, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and  Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces.5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

description.zh: 由於休閒產業與生活息息相關，期予學生能充分瞭解休業，將來就業或是對未來休閒生活都會有很大幫助。課程內包括：1.休閒產業簡介、2.休閒的經營系統、3.休閒的型式與活動、4.休閒的顧客服務。
description.en: Because the recreation industry correlation about the life, hope students will understand recreation and have much helpfulness to purse an occupation or life of recreation. The course include:1.The introduction of recreation industry.2.The working system of recreation.3.The play and style of recreation.4.The customer service of recreation.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於幫助學生瞭解現代的投資理論與其對投資管理的應用。當您完成此課，您勢必對證券評價與投資組合管理有透徹的瞭解。您將具備基本的理論技能，使您得以瞭解現代投資學的發展，並且熟悉與投資有關的實務。本課程涵蓋下列主題：1) 投資組合概念：風險與風險規避、風險性資產與無風險性資產之間的資本分配、最適風險性投資組合。2) 資本市場均衡：資本資產定價模型、單一指數與多因子模型、套利定價理論、市場效率。3) 固定收益證券：債券價格與殖利率、債券投資組合管理。4) 權益評價模型。5) 投資組合績效評估
description.en: The goal of this course is to provide a basic understanding of modern investment theory and its application to investment management. When you finish this course, you should have a thorough understanding of security pricing and portfolio management. You will have basic theoretical skills enabling you to understand modern developments in investments and you will be familiar with investment practices. The course will cover the following areas: 1) Portfolio Theory: Risk and Risk Aversion, Capital Allocation between the Risky Asset and the Risk-Free Asset and Optimal Risky Portfolios; 2) Equilibrium in Capital Markets: Capital Asset Pricing Model, Single-Index and Multifactor Models, Arbitrage Pricing Theory and Market Efficiency; 3) Fixed-Income Securities: Bond Prices and Yields, Managing Bond Portfolios; 4) Equity Valuation Models; 5) Portfolio Performance Evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程在寒暑假間進行。學生組團由一至兩位教授帶領，到國外（含中國大陸）與先安排好的一合作大學宿讀約二星期。此期間每週日上午由國外合作大學派員在課堂學員們介紹該國地域性的企業廠商實地觀摩與考察。行程最後兩天為綜合討論，由領隊教授引導主持，配合當地合作大學教授問一同舉辦一場小型研討會，學生們必須在反台灣後一個月內提交心得報告及建議事項。
description.en: This course is to be conducted during the summer or winter breaks. Led by one or two professors, students will travel to overseas (including Mainland China) and study at a pre-arranged local university for around two weeks. During each morning of the weekdays, students will be briefed on the business environment and national policies of the countries they are visiting. They will then conduct the tours of local business in the afternoon. A seminar, facilitated by the professors, will be held at the end of the trip to address their views and opinions. Students are required to submit a final report with recommendations within one month after their return to Taiwan.

description.zh: 知識管理是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程將介紹當代知識管理領域的重要議題，並運用管理實例介紹知識管理的基本概念如知識定義、知識獲取、知識分享、知識利用及知識的衡量。
description.en: Knowledge Management (KM) is a concept involved in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields. This curriculum will introduce the contemporary topics of knowledge management, and the applications and case studies of KM, including the basic concept, knowledge definition, knowledge expression, knowledge acquisition, knowledge sharing, knowledge exploitation and knowledge measurement. The SmartKMS will be discussed also.

description.en: This course provides useful techniques for analyzing industries and the strategic logics of industrial organization. By this course training, students are expected to have sufficient capability to make comprehensive analysis of an industry and to provide possible (might be valuable) strategies for a specific firm.

description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

name.en: An Introduction to Philosophy of Ecology

description.zh: 本課程將介紹分析下列基本思想：生態中心主義（內含深層生態及動物權及自然權、土地倫理、檢樸生活）、人中心主義（內含淺層生態/環境主義及環境正義、本土化及環球化等議題）、生態女性主義、荒野保護主義、生態社會主義，時間輪迴歷史觀, 綠色宗教論述 (如基督教生態思潮、佛經生態思潮、儒家與生態，原住民生態論述，以及後現代生態科學論述（內含混沌、複雜、模糊及量子力學等理論）。
description.en: Our course will critically and analytically introduce the following basic concepts: ecocentrism (covering deep ecology, rights of nature, right of animals, land ethics, and simple lifestyle), anthropocentrism (shallow ecology and environmentalism covering local and global issues ), ecofeminism, preservation of wilderness, ecosocialism, cyclic perspective of history, greening religions (eco-Christianity, eco-Buddhism, Confucianism and Ecology, indigenous ecological discourses, postmodern theories of sciences  (including chaotic theory, fuzzy theory, theory of complexity, and quantum theory).
